thread.title: Will Smith Announces He's Going on a World Tour With DJ Jazzy Jeff
thread.title_full: Will Smith Announces He's Going on a World Tour With DJ Jazzy Jeff

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Will Smith Announces He's Going on a World Tour With DJ Jazzy Jeff
text:
Comments Smith revealed in an interview on Beats 1 Radio that he is going on a world tour next summer with DJ Jazzy Jeff. 
In the wake of releasing a new music earlier this month, Will Smith has announced plans to embark on a world tour next summer with DJ Jazzy Jeff for their first time on the road together. The " The Pursuit of Happyness " actor revealed the tour plans during a new interview on Beats 1 Radio. "Jeff and I actually have never done a full tour," the 47-year-old entertainer said in the interview. "I was always on 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air', or making a movie. So I'm looking this summer to be the first time we go out on a full world tour." Asked about recording new songs, Smith said, "I'm pretty much poppin' in the studio everyday and I'm looking for artists to collaborate with." He then added, "I've probably recorded 30 songs. I have six or seven that I really, really like." During the interview, Smith also admitted to be feeling "terrified" to get back into the world of music after such a long hiatus. Though so, he claimed, "I'm really ready man. I've got a whole lot of heart to share, and I'm really excited about getting it into my music."
